summary.overallFindings: Microsoft Corporation demonstrates comprehensive responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, with detailed public evidence for transparency, fairness, explainability, oversight, privacy, governance, and public commitments. The company provides extensive documentation, open-source tools, and policy disclosures supporting each area. No significant gaps were identified, and Microsoft's approach aligns with industry best practices and regulatory expectations. This positions Microsoft as a leader in responsible AI implementation.
